note.p: Landowner. Of Llwyn, Montgomeryshire, Wales. Son of John Humffreys (d. 1817); inherited the property from his brother, John (d. 1824). Living at Llanygog, Montgomeryshire, Wales, in 1851. Borrowed money from Robert Waring Darwin.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/2499/753/9)
letter from Thomas Salt to E. A. Darwin, 8 February 1849 (Correspondence vol. 24, Supplement)
